name: LD51 - Lab Rat
description:
Get the recipes right and in order to win the level, or fail and try again. One machine gives you a new flask every 10 seconds, another machine awaits your product. Other machines do other things.

Controls:
  • Mouse: Look around
  • WASD: Move around
  • E: Pick up / drop 
  • P: Pause
  • F10: Toggle mouse capture
  • Left mouse button: Mouse capture

Very advanced hint:
You know what happens if you mix primary colors?

Credits:

All coding and “art” done by me during the LD51 Compo
Font: Series Orbit by Victory Type (type.nu)
